Sentencas: An anode-supported flat-tubular solid oxide fuel cell is an advanced cell design, which offers many advantages including a high volumetric power density, a minimized sealing area and a high resistance to thermal cycling.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes

Sentencas: Infiltration of nano-sized noble metal catalysts into a porous cathode is known to be an effective method to improve cathode performances at reduced temperatures, but the cathode stability is of potential concern.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes

Sentencas: This study addresses the performance and durability of anode-supported flat-tubular solid oxide fuel cells with Ag-infiltrated cathodes.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes

Sentencas: Uniformly dispersed Ag nanoparticles on the cathode are formed via a wet infiltration technique combined with subsequent heat-treatment.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes

Sentencas: Although the Ag infiltration results in improved cell performance, the durability tests indicate that the cell performance degrades over time and that the degradation rate increases with increasing Ag loading in the cathode.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes

Sentencas: The observed performance degradation is mainly attributed to formation of large-scale Ag agglomerates.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes

Sentencas: A strategy based on an inter-dispersed composite of Ag and CeO2 nanoparticles is proposed to mitigate the performance degradation.
Titulo: Performance and Durability of Anode-Supported Flat-Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Ag-Infiltrated Cathodes
